text: I hope the "carrier battle group's display of force photo" accompanying this article is an archive photo; and, not indicative of the conventional warfare style of fighting, considering we may become engaged in a nuclear war with North Korea on short notice. The ships should be mutually supporting, and positioned to defend the vulnerable carrier at the heart of the task force; but, they need to be very widely dispersed...miles apart! All too often, we have been underestimating our enemies; while we have actually are being played by them in well orchestrated, multi-phased, multi-level operational plans...often times by third parties...like Russia, China, or even Iran.
